titleStmt.title: Barbara Allen's cruelty: or, The young-man's tragedy. With Barbara Allen's [l]amentation for her unkindness to her lover, and her self. To the tune of Brbara [sic] Allen. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Deacon, J. Blare, J. Back.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "In Scarlet Town where I was bound ..."
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
